name: LineNumberTextView
summary: LineNumberTextView is a simple subclass of NSTextView, which adds line numbers to the left of the text view.
description: LineNumberTextView is a simple subclass of NSTextView, which adds line numbers to the left of the text view. Originally written by Raphael Hanneken. https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/line-number-text-view
